alert.note: Alert for Anson; Montgomery; Richmond (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 2:16PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Anson, south central Montgomery and northwestern Richmond Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 215 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wadesboro, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail and minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wadesboro, Ansonville, Polkton, Mount Gilead, Lilesville, Norman, Blewett Falls Lake, Covington and Pekin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
